Section_A.directions: In this section,you will hear three news reports. At the end of each news report,you will hear tmo or three questions. Both the news report and the questions will be spoken only once. After you hear a question,you must choose the best answer from the four choices marked A）,B）,C） and D）. Then mark the corresponding letter on Answer Sheet 1 with a single line through the centre.

options.A: Part of its dam wall collapsed.
options.B: It released a lot of harmful gases.
options.C: It was destroyed by an earthquake.
options.D: Some miners were trapped underground.

options.D: It was followed by two more earthquakes.

Section_B.directions: In this section,you will hear two long conversations. At the end of each conversation,you will hear four questions. Both the conversation and the questions will be spoken only once. After you hear a question,you must choose the best answer from the four choices marked A）,B）,C） and D）. Then mark the corresponding letter on Answer Sheet 1 with a single line through the centre.

Section_C.directions: In this section,you will hear three passages. At the end of each passage,you will hear three or four questions. Both the passage and the questions will be spoken only once. After you hear a question,you must choose the best ansver from the four choices marked A）,B）,C） and D）. Then mark the corresponding letter on Answer Sheet 1 with a single line through the centre.
